name: FastBunny Adventure
description:
Prototype 2D endless side racing game with touchscreen support.

Controls:

  • A key or <- (left arrow on the keyboard) = moves the Bunny to the left.
  • D key or -> (right keyboard arrow) = moves the Bunny to the right.
  • Space key makes Bunny jump.

To activate the touchscreen mode, it is necessary to access the settings option in the title menu and activate the checkmark "Touch Mode".
